ì¬ë°Œë„¤ìš”. ì•„ì§ ë­í¬ê°€ ë‚®ì•„ì„œ ê·¸ëŸ°ì§€ ì‰ì´í”„ë¥¼ ì¨ë„ íŒì ì•ì—ì„œ ë‚´ë©´ì˜ ì•… ê²Œì´ì§€ë¥¼ ë‹¤ ë¹¨ë ¤ì£¼ëŠ” ì‚¬ëŒë“¤ì´ ë§ì•„ìš”.

It is fun game but has a toxic community, I'm not blaming the game tho xD.

-STORY-

Obviously I am new to the game AND still trying to learn the game and his mechanics.
So I played as killer and decided to be the Clown "The Worst Killer" in the game (I heard the clown was the worst killer in the game, but it's not bad as long as you know what you are doing xD) so, everything was fine I hooked 2 survivors they were both dead, and then they were 2 survivors left. I caught a survivor while he was trying to "hide" from me, I think, so I hooked him up and the last guy was near the hooked survivor I Just could feel it! Just so you guys know they had to finish the last 2 or 3 I think generators, but he decided to help his teammate by hiding behind my back it didn't go as planned as he thought. He/She was near me as I said I could feel that he/she was around me, so I started looking around I looked everywhere I could hear his/her character making noise because he/she was injured. So he/she wasn't that smart and decided to come out of the small "garage" thing door and surprisingly I was there too, so I chased him/her, and him/her tried to "360" me or something like that I didn't even know what he/she was doing xD and then I hit him/her, and he/she falls down, I picked him/her up and hooked him/her up and btw this chase was around the guy that was hooked up before I saw the him/her. After the match was over the "him/her" person started to insult me, calling me names and said he was going to report me and I asked him "why are you reporting me why did you insult me what did I do wrong?" Just because you are mad at your own fault doesn't mean you can insult the other person! I'm just thinking did he insult me because he/she thought I was camping or something like that because I was looking around for so long? Maybe it's because of a misunderstanding but still you can't just insult people like that! And I have like 14 hrs on this game and the "he/she" person had like 200 hrs on this game like you don't even have enough experience to call me names we both suck at this game, this guy/girl is a noob too like me, I mean come on am I wrong? Anyway thanks for reading my crap story xD.

I discovered it in 2020 and I find it funny how hunting survivors and killing or hanging them on hooks can bring relief in these troublesome times. Hiding and running from killers as a survivor is just training for zombie apocalypse which might be closer than ever considering what's going on in the world. People say it's unbalanced and toxic. Maybe I didn't play it enough yet, but I usually have a lot of fun. I think many people just try to hard or take it too personal. Don't expect to much, remember you can't win every game and go back to the fog. Also watch few shinywindow's videos to see how you can find joy in this game.

Cheers.

A really good game to play either alone or with friends, getting updated frequently which makes the game still enjoyable to play. Could be frustrating sometimes but that has to do with the others players not the game itself.
Good game that can keep you entertained for 1000s of hours. The devs bring out new content regularly too.
